channel.title: Using favors along w/ terri lvl. 3
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Using favors along w/ terri lvl. 3"

item.title: Re: Using favors along w/ terri lvl. 3
item.content:encoded:
A favor counts for no damage. You can use it along with Terri 3, but it won't help you get the drop.

Morning EDUT; Of course, I assumed you meant using the Kaiju favor. If you use the stamina favor you can attack more and all the damage counts.

item.title: Using favors along w/ terri lvl. 3
item.content:encoded:
so i was wondering if you could use storm favors along w/ terri lvl. 3 and get more points along w/ attacking the kaiju
thanx
